show-dhw-settings.title: Domestic hot water settings
show-dhw-settings.description: Shows the settings for domestic hot water preparation in table format

content.text: Show me a matrix for the domestic hot water (dhw) settings of my heatpump via ems-esp-mcp. Show start temperatures, stop temperatures and differential temperatures as columns, and as rows use eco, eco+, comfort, disinfection and onetime.

show-heat-curve.title: Heat curve
show-heat-curve.description: Shows the configured heat curve as a graph

content.text:
Show the heat curve with the following elements in a graph with the outside temperature on the x-axis and the target flow temperature on the y-axis and the following points defining the curve:
 - (minexttemp / designtemp)
 - (summertemp / minflowtemp)
Additionally, show as a horizontal line the maxflowtemp
